articles.description: Some of the members of the Indian Test team are set to be part of a unique list of players who have played against a father-son duo in Test cricket as they take the field on July 12 for the first Test against the West Indies.
articles.content: Some of the members of the Indian Test team are set to be part of a small list of players who have played against a father-son duo in Test cricket as they take the field on July 12 for the first Test… [+2554 chars]
